sources.name: DelimitedText1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DelimitedText1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://flinsurance1.dfs.core.windows.net/insurance1/FL_insurance.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DelimitedText1,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"eq_site_limit", type number}}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Changed column type", {"policyID", "county", "eq_site_limit"}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Choose columns", {"county", "eq_site_limit"}, {{"No. of Policies", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Grouped rows", {{"eq_site_limit", Order.Descending}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Sorted rows", {{"No. of Policies", "Policies"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
